title: Spirit angler waders

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Spirit angler waders are an upgraded version of the angler waders. They can be purchased from Gita Prymes by exchanging angler waders along with 1,200 spirit flakes. The waders grant 0.6% bonus Fishing experience. Tempoross has a skill requirement of 35 fishing, therefore the waders require 35 fishing to wear.

Spirit angler waders

Advanced data
Item ID25596

The Spirit angler waders are an upgraded version of the angler waders. They can be purchased from Gita Prymes by exchanging angler waders along with 1,200 spirit flakes. The waders grant 0.6% bonus Fishing experience. Tempoross has a skill requirement of 35 fishing, therefore the waders require 35 fishing to wear.

Wearing the complete Spirit angler outfit acts as a rope for tethering to totem poles and masts while battling Tempoross, and grants an additional 1.9% bonus fishing experience.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room, as part of the Spirit angler's outfit set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

[[File:Spirit angler waders detail.png|75px|left]]
The '''Spirit angler waders''' are an upgraded version of the [[angler waders]]. They can be purchased from [[Gita Prymes]] by exchanging [[angler waders]] along with 1,200 [[spirit flakes]]. The waders grant 0.6% bonus [[Fishing]] [[experience]]. Tempoross has a skill requirement of 35 fishing, therefore the waders require 35 fishing to wear.

Wearing the complete Spirit angler outfit acts as a [[rope]] for tethering to [[totem pole]]s and [[mast]]s while battling [[Tempoross]], and grants an additional 1.9% bonus fishing experience.

{{Costume storage|armour case|[[Spirit angler's outfit]] set|set=true}}
